pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to REST API of (EuPathDB) // This package provides an interface to the Web Services of Eukaryotic Pathogen Database Resources (EuPathDB). The code is mostly programmatically generated by reading the WADL files describing the different methods and resources. Version 1.0-0 differs from the first version by collapsing the XML and JSON versions of each method into a single function and allows the caller to specify which version to use. The JSON version is the default for each method. The code is created by the generate2.R script in this directory and version 0.2-0 or higher of the WADL package.
